description: Explore the potential risks associated with forking open-source projects, including community fragmentation, maintenance challenges, compatibility issues, legal considerations, and resource allocation. Understand how these risks can lead to obsolescence and stifled collaboration if not carefully managed.
keywords: forking, open-source projects, community fragmentation, maintenance challenges, compatibility issues, legal considerations, resource allocation, obsolescence, collaboration
title: Understanding the Risks of Forking Open-Source Projects
